children.placeholderText: Please mention reason for not approved
children.label: Accounts Remarks

children.isVisible:
{{(payment_start_date.formattedDate
	 && payment_end_date.formattedDate
	 &&
	 amount_paid_val.isValid
	&& payment_type_val.selectedOptionValue && payment_mode_val.selectedOptionValue
	&& transaction_date_valye.formattedDate && transaction_id_valye.isValid
	&& payment_status.selectedOptionValue
&& payment_remarks.isValid
&&
(payment_start_date.formattedDate!=payment_end_date.formattedDate)
&&
(payment_start_date.formattedDate<payment_end_date.formattedDate)
)?true:false}}
